post.body: Yes and it's an anagram of "one brain". @asiandon is my brother BTW. ... When predictive texting try "coal".
Subbacultcha misheard lyric - "I was looking handsome, she was looking like an erotic porkchop" (credit @asiandon )
I used to LOVE Trompe Le Monde but played it last week and it left me cold. I think I go in cycles with it.
Editorial and blog it seems? But not intuitive. Hope I'm not ruining your experiment by replying. @huffpost Hey darlinks!
Different players vary in load speeds. I noticed Ben Stiller is on CollegeHumor which was slow for me when I embedded.
Paid becso am prawf. Ffeindiais i camgameriad yn meddalwedd Twhirl.
Au contraire, why not consider using this extra visitor info you have - if appropriate to your methods? (Although I don't...)
Feel free to ignore this. (It's a test reply to your tweet about WalMart.)
Mae'n flin gyda fi. Dw i'n ceisio rhywbeth - amateb prawf i tweet "banging old house party"
this is a test reply to your "unreliable wi-fi connection" tweet from 20th Dec
Did you know... "Feh" is the original Yiddish version of "meh"
Target audience is the competent but they are not all geeks like you and me! I am starting to favour .com
True I guess. If only I'd had the foresight to register tv.com back then, I could catch 'em all!
This is insane. Make something like it to finance your masters. http://tinyurl.com/9fefhq
Tweetree automates 2 things - inline pics/vids and threading chats (albeit not perfect yet) http://tweetree.com/saesneg
Well, belated congrats to you both on that! @lobeliasabo
Come on BBC, why is Charlie Brooker's Screenwipe relegated to the corners of BBC4? It should be on, like, every channel simultaneously.
RT @sleeveface: Looking at Quantcast Top Million 2008. Sleeveface.com was 109,687th most visited, w00t! http://www.quantcast.com/top-sites-1
Question for you - do I promote .com or .tv? Obviously I'll register both, but do the public "understand" a .tv yet?
happy old year
